summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Nano Botanix | Recovery Night Gel Moisturizer - with Hyaluronic Acid, Dual Peptides, and Color Correction - plus Aloe, Licorice, and Green Tea Extracts - Recover and Repair - 1.7 OZ (50mL)
Review Date: 2022/08/18
Store: Nano Botanix
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Nano Botanix', 'Unit Count': '1.70 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Use for': 'Face', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '6.46 x 1.5 x 1.42 inches; 1.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '850034727271'}
Review Text: There's really no fragrance which is kind of a bummer BUT the gel is light weight, soaks in well and hydrates beautifully.  I love this product line and tried this as an alternative to the night serum. I love both.  This seems to absorb quicker into my skin. Leaves no greasy residue,  not sticky. Super soft. I highly recommend this and all of their products.  I'm 54 and am enjoying more glowing, youthful looking skin.
Review Title: After 2 weeks I can see a nice decrease in fine lines
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: GOMAY Hydrating Amino Acid Foaming Facial Cleanser, Daily Face Wash for Makeup Remover with Face Cleansing Brush
Review Date: 2022/08/26
Store: GO MAY
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'GO MAY', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Material Type Free': 'Oil-free,Soap-free', 'Unit Count': '5.00 Fl Oz', 'Item Package Quantity': '1', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 6 inches; 8.96 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GM-FC03', 'UPC': '633183294814'}
Review Text: Great on sensitive skin. I love the scrubber. Soft silicone like fingers that massage your skin as you wash. All in one,  I love it.  Easy to dispense and fits well in hand. Cap to keep it sterile.  Great product. Great value for the money. Not harsh but deep cleaning.
Review Title: Easy to use, no fragrance,  deep clean
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: VOFEL Jelly Masks for Facials Mask Powder for Moisturizing Anti Aging Jelly Face Mask Peel Off 9 Pcs
Review Date: 2022/08/27
Store: VOFEL
Average Rating: 3.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'VOFEL', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Scent': 'Vanilla,Lemon', 'Skin Type': 'All, Oily, Sensitive', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '6.5 x 3.46 x 1.46 inches; 5.86 Ounces', 'UPC': '770456407264'}
Review Text: Dries to powder, like clay. Re-wet it then after a minute, it loosened up and could be torn off. Didnt hydrate, just dried out my skin. Didn't notice any lightening of my skin.
Review Title: Dries hard. Re-wet then tears off. Faux fragrances
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Vitamasques Cica Green Tea Jelly Facial Cleanser Gentle pH Cleanser is Refreshing, Cleansing & Exfoliating for Smooth, Clean & Radiant Skin - Vegan, Free from Parabens & Gluten
Review Date: 2022/08/27
Store: Vitamasques
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Vitamasques', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Material Feature': 'Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '5.24 x 1.81 x 1.38 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '750258969917'}
Review Text: While yes, it deep cleaned my skin it also dried it out terribly.  Great lather but I couldn't wash it off fast enough. I nearly vomited. Its truely awful. Wet dog and day old beach seaweed aroma. I won't use anymore of this product and I had to use another cleanser just to remove the smell.
Review Title: Fragrance please. This smells like wet dog
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Organic Patchouli Beard Wash by American Shaving Co, Rich, Foaming Cleanser that Softens, cleanse & Strengthens the beard hair, Clean and Refresh your beard with Patchouli Fragrance - 8 oz
Review Date: 2022/08/28
Store: American Shaving Co.
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Brand': 'American Shaving Co.', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '8.0 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '7.84 x 1.85 x 1.81 inches; 8.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '685167904479'}
Review Text: The fragrance is not over powering,  just enough. It deeply cleaned my hair of buildup from styling products. Literally squeaky clean. This is not a shampoo for daily use but its fantastic for WOMEN with dull, lifeless hair to remove buildup. I love it. I will happily buy this again. (Shake well before use)
Review Title: Light fragrance, deep cleansing
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Olive And Avocado Hair Mask For Hair Growth And Dry Damaged Hair By BACC Beauty And Care - Treatment With Natural Extracts | Deep Moisturizer | Hydrates | Repairs And Soften | Hair Mask For Dry Damaged Hair For Women And Men - 18.5 Fl Oz 550ml
Review Date: 2022/09/05
Store: BACC Beauty and Care
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'BACC Beauty and Care', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Product Benefits': 'Damage Control', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Conditioner,Conditioning,Hair Growth,Hydrating,Nourishing', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4 x 4 x 3.5 inches', 'Item model number': 'BACC-MSCRLLACAPILAROLVAGUCTE', 'UPC': '697521784740'}
Review Text: I needed a mask for my very long, dry hair. Avocado is so good for your hair and I'm overall, pretty happy with this product. I left it in longer than suggested bc my hair is so dry. When I rinsed it out and towel dried my hair, I could see the curls coming back. The longer I use it, the more it nourishes my hair. I will absolutely get this again and again. Would be nice to have a yummy fragrance but I'm still loving my hair after using this.
Review Title: Moderately hydrating after first use, easy to use
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MRTREUP Neon Face Paint UV Glow Body Paint Water Activated Eyeliner , 6 Colors Cake Eyelier Fluorescent Hydra Graphic Pink Green Glow in the Dark Body Paint for Club Halloween Party Makeup Art Paint
Review Date: 2022/09/09
Store: MRTREUP
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MRTREUP', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Package Information': 'Palette', 'Package Type': 'Palette', 'Specialty': 'Hypoallergenic', 'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 1.6 x 1.5 inches; 3.99 Ounces'}
Review Text: Could not be easier to use. Wet brush and start painting. Deeply pigmented,  long lasting.  I love these and will absolutely buy them again.
Review Title: Fabulous colors, deeply pigmented FUN
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: MEIQIER Eye Massager with Natural Quartz Jade, Facial Massage Tool with Heat & Vibration for Eliminate Eye Bags, Dark Circle Remover Eye Lip Fine Lines, Promote Essence Absorption
Review Date: 2022/11/03
Store: MEIQIER
Average Rating: 3.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MEIQIER', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Material Feature': 'Natural'}
Review Text: I use this every day. While I'm brushing my teeth and getting ready for my day. It cane with no instructions but its fairly easy to figure out. Too, just come back to the product description online and read how to use it. Charged pretty quick and lasts about 4 days on one charge.  The laugh lines and frown lines are slowly loosing their depth and overall, my skin tone has evened out quite a bit. I'm happy with it. Its quick, very convenient and does offer results with disciplined use. Try it!!
Review Title: After a month of use I can see a visible difference
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Wax Beads, LEMONTRA 1lb Hard Wax Beads for Hair Removal, Wax Beans for Brazilian Waxing, Hard Wax for Sensitive Skin with Aloe Vera Formula, Waxing Beads for Eyebrow Bikini Legs Facial for Women Men
Review Date: 2022/11/09
Store: LEMONTRA
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'LEMONTRA', 'Product Benefits': 'Suitable for sensitive skin, Depilation', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '9.69 x 6.57 x 2.32 inches; 1.01 Pounds'}
Review Text: After 2 months of use I can say I'm very happy with this brand. I will try another fragrance from them this time just for a difference. the pellets melt evenly in my pot and went on easier. I DO use an exfoliator in conjunction with this wax to prevent ingrown hairs but I'm happy with the fragrance and am excited to try their others. After 6 weeks I noticed my leg hair decreased in size and stiffness so that's a huge plus. Awesome company. Awesome product.
Review Title: I love these.  Easy to melt and use
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details:

        1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked.

        2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked.

        3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects.

        Format your response exactly as follows:
        POSITIVE SUMMARY:
        [Your positive summary here]

        NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
        [Your negative summary here]

        OVERALL SUMMARY:
        [Your overall summary here]
raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has had several positive experiences with various skincare and beauty products. They consistently appreciate lightweight, hydrating formulas that absorb quickly and leave skin feeling soft and nourished. The user enjoys products that come with innovative tools, such as facial scrubbing brushes, which enhance their cleansing routine. They express satisfaction with the efficacy of products, noting significant improvements in skin appearance and condition, like reduced fine lines and enhanced glow. Ease of use and convenience are highlighted, particularly for items that deliver visible results with consistent application. The user is also enthusiastic about vibrant and deeply pigmented cosmetic products, indicating they enjoy the fun and creativity in their makeup application.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
The user has encountered disappointing experiences with certain products that failed to meet expectations. Complaints include products that overly dry the skin or present unpleasant scents, likening one to "wet dog." Other products were noted for their ineffective results, with a lack of hydration attributed to certain masks. Additionally, there were frustrations related to product usability, such as the absence of instructions that complicated their experience. In some cases, the user expressed frustration over texture and feel, such as needing to re-wet masks that dry too hard.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's shopping history reflects a mixture of positive and negative experiences with skincare and beauty products. Positive aspects highlight a preference for effective, hydrating formulas that improve skin appearance and ease of use. However, they also faced challenges with products that dried out their skin, offered undesirable scents, or lacked clear instructions. The user remains committed to exploring new items, indicating a willingness to find alternatives that align with their skincare goals while enjoying the vibrant and creative aspects of beauty products. Their engagement indicates a discerning but hopeful approach to skincare and beauty shopping, seeking both quality results and enjoyable experiences.

target_interaction.title: Thick, creamy exfoliant
target_interaction.text: The smell is more strawberry rhubarb but it's like a facial cream in texture. Ultra smooth going on. You can feel the moisturizing as you use this. Zero irritation on sensitive skin. Highly giftable. Great packaging, durable, tight lid container.  Ample product so it's a great value for the money. You can use it with your fav scrubby for enhanced sensation and exfoliating. Leaves skin clean and glowing. Skin feels nourished, refreshed. Good stuff!!!
target_interaction.title_meta: Everyday Beauty Strawberry Exfoliator, Nourishing, Hydrating, and Rich Antioxidant Exfoliating Scrub with Ginseng, Strawberry Seeds, and Black Currant for Dry Dehydrated, and Aging Skin, 1.7 oz. Jar
